Title: Relates to equitable distribution of marital property and awards of spousal support for persons convicted of certain offenses
Summary: Waives the requirement of equitable distribution of marital property and awards of spousal support for persons convicted of domestic violence offenses.
LawCode: Amd ยง236, Dom Rel L; amd ยง412, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to the equitable distribution of marital property; and to amend the family court act, in relation to awards of spousal support for persons convicted of certain offenses
